name: Caroot
description:
=============================
Today is a bad day for Bulbi, a gnome colony started a mining business right in his peaceful cave while he was hibernating.

The gnomes do not seem open to diplomacy... Bulbi will have to throw them out of here!
=============================

SWING! ROOT! SMASH! Use Bulbi's grappling roots to swing around the cavern, and collect as many power upgrades as you can.
Once the timer runs out, Bulbi will root himself in the walls. Then, you'll have to defend yourself against a wave of gnomes using grabby vines. Grab them, and smash them against the walls or throw them!
Once all gnomes are defeated, Bulbi unroots himself, and the cycle continues until all waves are cleared.
Don't get gnomed!

Caroot was made during the 2023 Global Game Jam. The theme was "Root".

Change sound volume with O and P or numpad - and +
Toggle mute with M
